Ambuye, imvani liu langa;makutu anu akhale chimvereremau a kupemba kwanga.
Mukasunga mphulupulu, Yehova,adzakhala chilili ndani, Ambuye?
Koma kwa Inu kuli chikhululukiro,kuti akuopeni.
Ndilindira Yehova, moyo wanga ulindira,ndiyembekeza mau ake.
Moyo wanga uyang'anira Ambuye,koposa alonda matanda kucha;inde koposa alonda matanda kucha.
Israele, uyembekezere Yehova;chifukwa kwa Yehova kuli chifundo,kwaonso kuchulukira chiombolo.
Ndipo adzaombola Israeleku mphulupulu zake zonse.
